name: Arcane Signet
oracle_text: {T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity.
flavor_text: It started as a mere drop of water. The Magic Mirror crystallized it into much more.

name: Avacyn's Pilgrim
oracle_text: {T}: Add {W}.
flavor_text: "Avacyn's protection is everywhere. From the holy church to the sacred glade, all that we see is under her blessed watch."

name: Bloodfell Caves
oracle_text:
Bloodfell Caves enters the battlefield tapped.
When Bloodfell Caves enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life.
{T}: Add {B} or {R}.

name: Blossoming Sands
oracle_text:
Blossoming Sands enters the battlefield tapped.
When Blossoming Sands enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life.
{T}: Add {G} or {W}.

name: Breath of Malfegor
oracle_text: Breath of Malfegor deals 5 damage to each opponent.
flavor_text: The blood of the demons quickened as their master rose over the battlefield. The blood of the angels also quickened: here was the chance to finally end the war started millennia ago.

name: Commander's Sphere
oracle_text:
{T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity.
Sacrifice Commander's Sphere: Draw a card.
flavor_text: It harmonizes with the essence of its master.

name: Command Tower
oracle_text: {T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity.
flavor_text:
"Approach my tower on bended knee or depart from it as ash upon the wind."
—Gadwick, the Wizened

name: Counterspell
oracle_text: Counter target spell.

name: Deep Analysis
oracle_text:
Target player draws two cards.
Flashback—{1}{U}, Pay 3 life. (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)
flavor_text: "The specimen seems to be broken."

name: Disenchant
oracle_text: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
flavor_text: Where the holy light of the angels has shone, only purity remains.

name: Dismal Backwater
oracle_text:
Dismal Backwater enters the battlefield tapped.
When Dismal Backwater enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life.
{T}: Add {U} or {B}.

name: Distant Melody
oracle_text: Choose a creature type. Draw a card for each permanent you control of that type.
flavor_text: Oona's song is like a twisted dinner chime. All the faeries return home, but it is Oona who feasts—on the stolen dreams and rumors they serve her.

name: Farhaven Elf
oracle_text: When Farhaven Elf enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
flavor_text: "Verdant bloom does exist. It merely hides for its own safety."

name: Feed the Swarm
oracle_text: Destroy target creature or enchantment an opponent controls. You lose life equal to that permanent's mana value.
flavor_text:
"On vile wings and bloody wind, the swarm will rise."
—Skyclave inscription

name: Fleshbag Marauder
oracle_text: When Fleshbag Marauder enters the battlefield, each player sacrifices a creature.
flavor_text: Grixis is a world where the only things found in abundance are death and decay. Corpses, whole or in part, are the standard currency among necromancers and demons.

name: Holdout Settlement
oracle_text:
{T}: Add {C}. ({C} represents colorless mana.)
{T}, Tap an untapped creature you control: Add one mana of any color.
flavor_text: Even in areas of profound devastation, the hedrons remained intact.

name: Jaspera Sentinel
oracle_text:
Reach
{T}, Tap an untapped creature you control: Add one mana of any color.
flavor_text: The arrows of the elvish elite strike as true and deadly as the fangs of the Cosmos Serpent they revere.

name: Lazotep Reaver
oracle_text: When Lazotep Reaver enters the battlefield, amass 1. (Put a +1/+1 counter on an Army you control. If you don't control one, create a 0/0 black Zombie Army creature token first.)
flavor_text: Despite their many forms, the Eternals worked in chilling harmony, unburdened by instinct or emotion.

name: Leafkin Druid
oracle_text: {T}: Add {G}. If you control four or more creatures, add {G}{G} instead.
flavor_text: "I am rooted in the life of all that thrives around me. You cannot move me."

name: Mana Geyser
oracle_text: Add {R} for each tapped land your opponents control.
flavor_text: The Quicksilver Sea hissed and bubbled at the indignity. The Vulshok shaman just smiled.

name: Murder
oracle_text: Destroy target creature.
flavor_text: Ob Nixilis decided the fastest way to seize control of New Capenna would be to usurp the networks of power already hidden there. Xander's Maestros were the first to fall.

name: Negate
oracle_text: Counter target noncreature spell.
flavor_text: "As one, nature lifts its voice to tell you this: 'No.'"

name: Nihil Spellbomb
oracle_text:
{T}, Sacrifice Nihil Spellbomb: Exile target player's graveyard.
When Nihil Spellbomb is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, you may pay {B}. If you do, draw a card.

name: Path of Ancestry
oracle_text:
Path of Ancestry enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity. When that mana is spent to cast a creature spell that shares a creature type with your commander, scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

name: Pilfered Plans
oracle_text: Target player mills two cards. Draw two cards.
flavor_text: Mirko Vosk hunted anyone with knowledge of the maze, draining the chances of the other guilds.

name: Pilgrim's Eye
oracle_text:
Flying
When Pilgrim's Eye enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
flavor_text: The kor send their thopter kites to see if the land is in a welcoming mood.

name: Presence of Gond
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has "{T}: Create a 1/1 green Elf Warrior creature token."
flavor_text: "Here lies Gond, hero of Safehold Taldwen. May he ever guide our quest."

name: Rapacious Dragon
oracle_text:
Flying
When Rapacious Dragon enters the battlefield, create two Treasure tokens. (They're artifacts with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")
flavor_text:
"Surely it won't notice if I take—"
—Theria the Sly, last words

name: Read the Bones
oracle_text: Scry 2, then draw two cards. You lose 2 life.
flavor_text: The dead know lessons the living haven't learned.

name: Return to Nature
oracle_text:
Choose one —
• Destroy target artifact.
• Destroy target enchantment.
• Exile target card from a graveyard.
flavor_text:
"Even steel and stone return to Ghrin-Danu in time."
—Katilda, Dawnhart Prime

name: Rootborn Defenses
oracle_text: Populate. Creatures you control gain indestructible until end of turn. (To populate, create a token that's a copy of a creature token you control.)
flavor_text: "No harm can come to me while the Worldsoul shelters me."

name: Rugged Highlands
oracle_text:
Rugged Highlands enters the battlefield tapped.
When Rugged Highlands enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life.
{T}: Add {R} or {G}.

name: Sakura-Tribe Elder
oracle_text: Sacrifice Sakura-Tribe Elder: Search your library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
flavor_text: He'd chosen a sunlit clearing with open skies and an ample brook. All that remained was to find a worthy sapling.

name: Scatter the Seeds
oracle_text:
Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.)
Create three 1/1 green Saproling creature tokens.
flavor_text: From the seeds of faith, great forests grow.

name: Selesnya Evangel
oracle_text: {1}, {T}, Tap an untapped creature you control: Create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token.
flavor_text: "The clamor of the city drowns all voices. But together we can sing a harmony that will resonate from Ravnica's tallest spires to her deepest wells."

name: Sign in Blood
oracle_text: Target player draws two cards and loses 2 life.
flavor_text: Little agonies pave the way to greater power.

name: Sky Diamond
oracle_text:
Sky Diamond enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {U}.
flavor_text: The essence of wind to lift up the weary.

name: Skyscanner
oracle_text:
Flying
When Skyscanner enters the battlefield, draw a card.
flavor_text: The municipal senate makes extensive use of the thopters, mostly to gather dirt on rival senators.

name: Spark Reaper
oracle_text: {3}, Sacrifice a creature or planeswalker: You gain 1 life and draw a card.
flavor_text:
"I know they're unstoppable fighters created to harvest souls—it's just they're so rude about it."
—Kaya

name: Sporemound
oracle_text: Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token.
flavor_text:
"If you threaten its territory, it produces spores. Actually, no matter what you do, it produces spores."
—Hadi Kasten, Calla Dale naturalist

name: Syphon Mind
oracle_text: Each other player discards a card. You draw a card for each card discarded this way.
flavor_text: When tempers run high, it's easy to lose your head.

name: Thermo-Alchemist
oracle_text:
Defender
{T}: Thermo-Alchemist deals 1 damage to each opponent.
Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, untap Thermo-Alchemist.
flavor_text: "Madness can't touch a mind ignited by genius."

name: Tranquil Cove
oracle_text:
Tranquil Cove enters the battlefield tapped.
When Tranquil Cove enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life.
{T}: Add {W} or {U}.

name: Vengeful Dead
oracle_text: Whenever Vengeful Dead or another Zombie dies, each opponent loses 1 life.
flavor_text: Those who don't learn from their deaths are destined to repeat them.

name: Wayfarer's Bauble
oracle_text: {2}, {T}, Sacrifice Wayfarer's Bauble: Search your library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
flavor_text: It is the forest beyond the horizon, the mountain waiting to be climbed, the new land across the endless sea.

name: Winged Words
oracle_text:
This spell costs {1} less to cast if you control a creature with flying.
Draw two cards.
flavor_text: Magic written across the sky falls like rain on thirsty ground, bringing forth wisdom in its season.
